SELECT count(z.id) FROM (select typ.id from ht_borrow_project_type typ LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_repay pr ON typ.borrow_class = pr.borrow_class GROUP BY pr.borrow_class , typ.borrow_project_type, typ.id, typ.borrow_cd, typ.borrow_name, typ.borrow_class, typ.invest_start, typ.invest_end, typ.increase_money, typ.interest_coupon, typ.taste_money, typ.invest_user_type, typ. status, typ.remark, typ.create_user_id, typ.update_user_id
ORDER BY typ.id)z

SELECT typ.borrow_project_type, typ.borrow_cd, typ.borrow_name, typ.borrow_class, typ.invest_start, typ.invest_end, typ.increase_money, typ.interest_coupon, typ.taste_money, typ.invest_user_type, typ.status, typ.remark, typ.create_user_id, typ.update_user_id, GROUP_CONCAT("", pr.repay_method, "") AS method_name, typ.increase_interest_flag FROM ht_borrow_project_type typ LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_repay pr ON typ.borrow_class = pr.borrow_class where typ.borrow_cd=#{borrowCd}

SELECT id, borrow_project_type, borrow_cd, borrow_name, borrow_class, invest_user_type, `status`, invest_start, invest_end, remark, create_user_id, create_time, update_user_id, update_time, increase_money, interest_coupon, taste_money, increase_interest_flag FROM ht_borrow_project_type where `status`=0 and borrow_name != '融通宝'
and borrowProjectType = 'HZT'
GROUP BY borrow_class
ORDER BY id asc;
